rules_text:
Kicker {5} [i](You may pay an additional {5} as you cast this spell.)[/i]
Being of Myth's power and toughness are equal to the number of cards in your hand.
Being of Myth has trample as long as its power is seven or greater.
When Being of Myth enters the battlefield, if it was kicked and you have fewer than seven cards in hand, draw cards equal to the difference.
